title: America dissected : being a full and true account of all the American colonies : shewing, the intemperance of the climates : excessive heat and cold ... badness of money : danger from enemies : but, above all, the danger to the souls of the poor people that remove thither, from the multifarious wicked and pestilent heresies that prevail in those parts : in several letters, from a rev. divine of the Church of England, missionary to America ...
imprint: Printed and sold by S. Powell, Dame Street
author: J. MacSparran
